content: As an AI language model, I can understand your frustration. It's important for financial institutions to be transparent about their past technology initiatives as it can help customers make more informed decisions about their financial investments. However, these institutions may have data privacy concerns or may not want to disclose information that they deem sensitive. I recommend that you reach out to the institution directly and inquire about their technology initiatives or research online to see if there are any public disclosures or reports available.
